thread.title: Green-N-Go cabs to offer free rides ahead of No Refusal NYE | kiiitv.com
thread.title_full: Green-N-Go cabs to offer free rides ahead of No Refusal NYE | kiiitv.com

author: Sam Huerta
title: Green-N-Go cabs to offer free rides ahead of No Refusal NYE | kiiitv.com
text:
CORPUS CHRISTI, Texas â€” Several law enforcement agencies across the state are cracking down on drunk drivers ahead of the New Year's Eve holiday.
Officers will be out in full force to arrest DWI drivers for their No Refusal DWI initiative.
Law enforcement wants you to remember that if you do plan to drink, it is important to have a plan for getting home.
That plan could include appointing a designated driver, or calling a ride share service.
Green-N-Go Cab Will once again be providing Free rides home. It begins at 9 p.m. on New Year's Eve and is available until 3 a.m. New Year's Day. The service is meant to get you home and not to another party.
The number to call is 361-299-9999.
